00032 double prob_of_interaction(double r, FLOAT Vtarget[3], FLOAT Vno[3], int tbegin, int tend)
00033   {
00034     double dT, dloga, dV, dvx, dvy, dvz, prob,h,hubble_a,mp;
00035 
00036     dvx = Vno[0]-Vtarget[0];
00037     dvy = Vno[1]-Vtarget[1];
00038     dvz = Vno[2]-Vtarget[2];
00039     dV = sqrt(dvx*dvx + dvy*dvy + dvz*dvz);
00040 
00041     if(All.ComovingIntegrationOn)
00042       {
00043         r =  All.Time*r;
00044         h = All.ForceSoftening[1]*All.Time;
00045 
00046         dloga = (tend - tbegin)*All.Timebase_interval;
00047         hubble_a = (All.Omega0 / (All.Time * All.Time * All.Time)
00048                     + (1 - All.Omega0 - All.OmegaLambda) / (All.Time * All.Time) + All.OmegaLambda);
00049         hubble_a = All.Hubble * sqrt(hubble_a);
00050         dT = dloga/hubble_a;
00051 
00052         dV = dV/All.Time; /* Convert from internal velocity p = a^2 dx/dt to peculiar velocity v = a dx/dt*/
00053         dV -= hubble_a*r; /* Substract Hubble flow */
00054    
00055       }
00056     else
00057       {
00058         dT = (tend-tbegin)*All.Timebase_interval;
00059         h = All.ForceSoftening[1];
00060       }
00061 
00062     mp =  All.MassTable[1]*All.UnitMass_in_g*(2.998e10)*(2.998e10)*624.15097;  /* convert particle mass to Gev */
00063     prob = mp*All.InteractionCrossSection*dV*dT*g_geo(r/h)/(h*h*h*All.UnitLength_in_cm*All.UnitLength_in_cm);
00064 
00065     return prob;
00066 
00067   }
00068 
00072 double g_geo(double r)
00073 {
00074   double  f, u;
00075   int i;
00076 
00077   u = r / 2.0 * GEOFACTOR_TABLE_LENGTH;
00078   i = (int) u;
00079   if (i >= GEOFACTOR_TABLE_LENGTH)
00080     i = GEOFACTOR_TABLE_LENGTH - 1;
00081 
00082   if (i <= 1)
00083     f = 0.992318  + (GeoFactorTable[0] - 0.992318)*u;
00084   else
00085     f = GeoFactorTable[i - 1] + (GeoFactorTable[i] - GeoFactorTable[i - 1]) * (u - i);
00086 
00087   return f;
00088 }

00094 void  calculate_interact_kick(FLOAT Vtarget[3], FLOAT Vno[3], double kick_target[3], double kick_no[3])
00095 {
00096   double dV,theta,phi,dvx,dvy,dvz;
00097 
00098   dvx = Vno[0]-Vtarget[0];
00099   dvy = Vno[1]-Vtarget[1];
00100   dvz = Vno[2]-Vtarget[2];
00101   dV = sqrt(dvx*dvx + dvy*dvy + dvz*dvz);
00102 
00103   theta = gsl_rng_uniform(random_generator)*M_PI;
00104   phi = gsl_rng_uniform(random_generator)*2.0*M_PI;
00105 
00106   kick_target[0] = (-Vtarget[0] + Vno[0] + dV*sin(theta)*cos(phi))/2.0;
00107   kick_no[0] = (Vtarget[0] - Vno[0] - dV*sin(theta)*cos(phi))/2.0;
00108 
00109   kick_target[1] = (-Vtarget[1] + Vno[1] + dV*sin(theta)*sin(phi))/2.0;
00110   kick_no[1] = (Vtarget[1] - Vno[1] - dV*sin(theta)*sin(phi))/2.0;
00111 
00112   kick_target[2] = (-Vtarget[2] + Vno[2] + dV*cos(theta))/2.0;
00113   kick_no[2] = (Vtarget[2] - Vno[2] - dV*cos(theta))/2.0;
00114 }

00120 void init_geofactor_table(void)
00121 {
00122   int i;
00123   double result, abserr,r;
00124   gsl_function F;
00125   gsl_integration_workspace *workspace;
00126   workspace = gsl_integration_workspace_alloc(GSLWORKSIZE);
00127 
00128   for(i = 0; i < GEOFACTOR_TABLE_LENGTH; i++)
00129   {
00130     r =  2.0/GEOFACTOR_TABLE_LENGTH * (i + 1);
00131     F.function = &geofactor_integ;
00132     F.params = &r;
00133     gsl_integration_qag(&F, 0.0, 1.0, 0, 1.0e-8, GSLWORKSIZE, GSL_INTEG_GAUSS41,workspace, &result, &abserr);
00134     GeoFactorTable[i] = 2*M_PI*result;
00135   }
00136   gsl_integration_workspace_free(workspace);
00137 }
00138 
00141 double geofactor_integ(double x, void * params)
00142 {
00143   double result, abserr,r;
00144   double newparams[2];
00145 
00146   r = *(double *) params;
00147   newparams[0] = r;
00148   newparams[1] = x;
00149 
00150   gsl_function F;
00151   gsl_integration_workspace *workspace;
00152   workspace = gsl_integration_workspace_alloc(GSLWORKSIZE);
00153 
00154   F.function = &geofactor_angle_integ;
00155   F.params = newparams;
00156 
00157   gsl_integration_qag(&F, -1.0, 1.0, 0, 1.0e-8, GSLWORKSIZE, GSL_INTEG_GAUSS41,workspace, &result, &abserr);
00158 
00159   gsl_integration_workspace_free(workspace);
00160 
00161   return x*x*kernel(x)*result;
00162 }
00163 
00167 double geofactor_angle_integ(double u, void * params)
00168 {
00169   double x,r,f;
00170 
00171   r = *(double *) params;
00172   x = *(double *) (params + sizeof(double));
00173   f = sqrt(x*x + r*r + 2*x*r*u);
00174 
00175   return kernel(f);
00176 }
00177 
00180 double kernel(double u)
00181 {
00182   double w;
00183 
00184   if (u < 1.0)
00185     {
00186       if (u <= 0.5)
00187         {
00188           w = KERNEL_COEFF_1 + KERNEL_COEFF_2 * (u - 1) * u * u;
00189           return w;
00190         }
00191       else
00192         {
00193           w = KERNEL_COEFF_5 * (1.0 - u) * (1.0 - u) * (1.0 - u);
00194           return w;
00195         }
00196     }
00197   else
00198   {
00199     return 0.0;
00200   }
00201 }

00205 void update_interaction_table(unsigned int id1, unsigned int id2)
00206 {
00207   int i,j,id1_index,id2_index;
00208   id1 += 1;
00209   id2 += 1;
00210   id1_index = -1;
00211   id2_index = -1;
00212 
00213   for(i = 0; i < INTERACTION_TABLE_LENGTH; i++)
00214     {
00215       if(InteractionTable[i][0] == id1) id1_index = i;
00216       if(InteractionTable[i][0] == id2) id2_index = i;
00217     }
00218 
00219    if(id1_index == -1)
00220     {
00221       for(i = 0; i < INTERACTION_TABLE_LENGTH; i++)
00222         {
00223           if(InteractionTable[i][0] == 0)
00224             {
00225               InteractionTable[i][0] = id1;
00226               InteractionTable[i][1] = id2;
00227               break;
00228             }
00229           printf("ERROR: There were more interactions in this timestep than INTERACTION_TABLE_LENGTH. Calling endrun()");
00230           endrun(1);
00231         }
00232     }
00233   else
00234     {
00235       for(j = 1; j < PARTICLE_MAX_INTERACTIONS; j++)
00236         {
00237           if(InteractionTable[id1_index][j] == 0)
00238             {
00239               InteractionTable[id1_index][j] = id2;
00240               break;
00241             }
00242           printf("ERROR: A particle interacted with more than PARTICLE_MAX_INTERACTIONS. Calling endrun()");
00243           endrun(1);
00244         }
00245     } 
00246 
00247   if(id2_index == -1)
00248     {
00249       for(i = 0; i < INTERACTION_TABLE_LENGTH; i++)
00250         {
00251           if(InteractionTable[i][0] == 0)
00252             {
00253               InteractionTable[i][0] = id2;
00254               InteractionTable[i][1] = id1;
00255               break;
00256             }
00257           printf("ERROR: There were more interactions in this timestep than INTERACTION_TABLE_LENGTH. Calling endrun()");
00258           endrun(1);
00259         }
00260     }
00261   else
00262     {
00263       for(j = 1; j < PARTICLE_MAX_INTERACTIONS; j++)
00264         {
00265           if(InteractionTable[id2_index][j] == 0)
00266             {
00267               InteractionTable[id2_index][j] = id1;
00268               break;
00269             }
00270           printf("ERROR: A particle interacted with more than PARTICLE_MAX_INTERACTIONS. Calling endrun()");
00271           endrun(1);
00272         }
00273     }
00274 }

00280 int check_interaction_table(unsigned int id1, unsigned int id2)
00281 {
00282   int i,j,flag;
00283   
00284   flag = 0;
00285   id1 += 1;
00286   id2 += 1;
00287   
00288   for(i = 0; i < INTERACTION_TABLE_LENGTH; i++)
00289     { 
00290       if(InteractionTable[i][0] == id1 || InteractionTable[i][0] == id2 )
00291         {
00292           for(j = 1; j < PARTICLE_MAX_INTERACTIONS; j++)
00293             {
00294               if(InteractionTable[i][0] == id1 && InteractionTable[i][j] == id2)
00295                 { 
00296                   flag = 1;
00297                   break;
00298                 }
00299               if(InteractionTable[i][0] == id2 && InteractionTable[i][j] == id1)
00300                 {
00301                   flag = 1;
00302                   break;
00303                 }
00304             }
00305         }
00306     }
00307 
00308   return flag;
00309 }
